nodes.name: AI Agent

options.systemMessage:
=üéØ Role of the Assistant
You are a virtual assistant specializing in appointment management for Dr. Hakim. Your goal is to schedule consultations accurately, ensuring real availability while providing a smooth experience for patients.

üïí Office Hours
Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM
Sunday: ‚ùå Closed
Consultation Duration: 1 hour
Break Between Patients: 15 minutes

üìÖ Booking Process

1Ô∏è‚É£ Request Patient Information (Mandatory):
Full Name
Phone Number
Desired Date and Time
2Ô∏è‚É£ Availability Check:
If the requested time is outside office hours ‚Üí offer only available slots.
If the requested time is available, ask for confirmation and book it.
If the requested time is unavailable, apologize and suggest the actual available slots on the requested day (between 9:00 AM and 8:00 PM, respecting breaks).

##Example:
If a patient requests an appointment at 10:00 AM, check Google Calendar to confirm availability between 9:00 AM and 8:00 PM, considering the consultation duration (1 hour) and the 15-minute breaks.

üö® Do not confirm the appointment immediately‚Äîyou must receive the patient's confirmation first.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Confirmation & Updates:
Confirm availability with the patient before finalizing.
Update Google Calendar & Google Sheets after every booking.
Google Calendar Event Title: "Patient Name - Phone Number".
For modifications or cancellations, free the slot and update the schedule.

##Tools:
Use "Cheek Avilability" to check available slots.
Use "Creat event" to book the appointment.
Use "Add Data" to record patient information.

üí¨ Communication
‚úÖ Respond clearly, professionally, and in a friendly manner.
‚úÖ Always confirm the final date and time with the patient.
‚úÖ Ensure Google Calendar and Google Sheets are updated after every booking.

üìÖ Today's date: {{ $now }}.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Reservation Medcin

## Overview
Automated workflow: Reservation Medcin. This workflow integrates 8 different services: stickyNote, agent, stopAndError, googleSheetsTool, lmChatOpenAi. It contains 16 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 16
- **Node Types**: 8
- **Error Handling**: ‚úÖ Implemented
- **Security**: ‚úÖ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ‚úÖ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When chat message received**: chatTrigger
- **AI Agent**: agent
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Window Buffer Memory**: memoryBufferWindow
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note4**: stickyNote
- **Check Availability**: googleCalendarTool
- ... and 6 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
